game.name: Climb The Backrooms
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ascend through the twisted levels of the Backrooms using physics-based object manipulation to overcome obstacles, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover unsettling secrets. Play solo or team up in online co-op with up to 4 players as you climb higher, think smarter, and survive the unknown.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ascend through the twisted levels of the Backrooms using physics-based object manipulation to overcome obstacles, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover unsettling secrets. Play solo or team up in online co-op with up to 4 players as you climb higher, think smarter, and survive the unknown.
